1.name: From the Manger to the Cross; or, Jesus of Nazareth
1.description: An account of the life of Jesus Christ, based on the books of the New Testament: After Jesus' birth is foretold to his parents, he is born in Bethlehem, and is visited by shepherds and wise...                See full summary »

2.name: Cleopatra
2.description: The fabled queen of Egypt's affair with Roman general Marc Antony is ulimately disastrous for both of them.

3.name: Richard III
3.description: Richard of Gloucester uses manipulation and murder to gain the English throne.

4.name: Satana
4.description: A four chapter film including Satan vs the Creator, Satan vs the Saviour, The Green Demon/Satan during the Dark Ages and The Red Demon/Satan in modern times.

5.name: Pilgrim's Progress
5.description: Consists of two parts: Part One: The Life of John Bunyon (2 reels); Part Two: The Pilgrim's Progress (3 reels).

6.name: La dame aux camélias
6.description: Marguerite is a courtesan in Paris. She falls deeply in love with a young man of promise, Armand Duval. When Armand's father begs her not to ruin his hope of a career and position by ...                See full summary »

9.name: Den flyvende cirkus
9.description: The Flying Circus was the largest traveling artist band in the country, and among its favorite artists were the rope-dancer, Laurento and the snake tamer, Ula Kiri. The hot blooded gypsy ...                See full summary »

10.name: Samhällets dom
10.description: Harald steals money in order to pay a personal guarantee. The crime is discovered and he is sentenced to imprisonment. After the penalty is served he travels to America to begin a new life.

11.name: As You Like It
11.description: After the overthrowing of Duke Senior by his tyrannical brother, Senior's daughter Rosalind disguises herself as a man and sets out to find her banished father while also counseling her clumsy suitor Orlando in the art of wooing.

12.name: Jess
12.description: Silas Croft was a kindly old Englishman who had a farm in South Africa. With him resided his two nieces, whom he had taken from their drunken, worthless father when they were of a tender ...                See full summary »

14.name: Le mystère des roches de Kador
14.description: The action takes place in Brittany .Fernand De Keranic wants to latch on to his niece and ward Suzanne's fortune.He tries to do away with her and her lover when she goes for a sail with ...                See full summary »

16.name: Anny - en gatepiges roman
16.description: Anny works in a cigar-shop. Wholesaler Willmann fancy Anny and hire her as his housemaid. Soon the two have an intimate relationship. But Anny finds someone new. At a carnival. Her next ...                See full summary »

17.name: Quincy Adams Sawyer
17.description: A Bostonian acts as a go-between for a foundling and her suitor in the small town of Mason's Corners, learning that the young woman's foster mother has hidden the secret of her parentage.

18.name: The Adventures of Lieutenant Petrosino
18.description: The story of Lt. Joseph Petrosino, an Italian-American New York City police detective, who was assigned to investigate the Sicilian Mafia, which was beginning to become a major problem in ...                See full summary »

19.name: Les mystères de Paris
19.description: The Archduke Rodolphe d'Illyrie is secretly united to Countess Sarah Mac Gregor and they have a daughter together. The young woman learns that her father-in-law is potting to have the ...                See full summary »

20.name: Oliver Twist
20.description: An orphan in early 19th century England escapes the poorhouse only to fall among a gang of pickpockets in London.

21.name: Oliver Twist
21.description: An orphan named Oliver Twist meets a pickpocket on the streets of London. From there, he joins a household of boys who are trained to steal for their master.

22.name: I lifvets vår
22.description: Little Gerta, when her mother dies. is brought to her father, Carl Von Seydling, a government official, who deserted his wife and child a few years before. Councilor Van Seydling found the ...                See full summary »

25.name: Erodiade
25.description: Herodias, wife of Philip of Iturea, gives her affections to her husband's brother, Herod. Their secret passion is discovered by John the Baptist. He denounces them, but, so great is his ...                See full summary »

27.name: Die Macht des Goldes
27.description: Drama about the country girl who becomes a model for an artist with no morals. Disheartened, she return to her home to her old friend Christoph who accidentally kills a man. Tempted to leave again, she awaits his dismissal.

28.name: Vampyrdanserinden
28.description: The man-hungry "vampire," later to be popularized by America's Theda Bara, made her screen debut in this Danish melodrama directed by August Blom. Clara Wieth starred in the title role of ...                See full synopsis »

29.name: The Price of Paradise
29.description: This presentation shows the relative rewards of good deeds and cost of bad deeds. A smart person can plan, decide to do best deeds and avoid the costly bad deeds so that he/she can build up...                See full summary »

32.name: Independenta Romaniei
32.description: The movie depicts the Romanian War of Independence (1877-1878).

35.name: Femme fatale
35.description: Juliette Groumet, a housemaid in a wealthy family, envies the luxury in which her employers live. Determined to live the good life one day, she is prepared to do anything to achieve her aim...                See full summary »

40.name: L'eroica fanciulla di Derna
40.description: This picture portrays the terrible assault upon Derna, in which the young Italian captain, Adolfo Bertini, was wounded in the forehead and, after a conflict, fell into the hands of the ...                See full summary »

42.name: Lucrezia Borgia
42.description: About the daughter of the Borgia, a noble medieval house. From her numerous and unhappy weddings, to the forced monacation, to the will of her family.

43.name: Il y a des pieds au plafond

45.name: De svarta maskerna
45.description: "The Black Masks", a secret political society, involves the beautiful agent Lydia to apprehend an important official document. Lieutenant von Muehlen is a trusted member of another secret society. He is on the same mission.

46.name: Keserü szerelem
46.description: An older man wants to propose to a young woman. However, her family decides to form a plot so that she won't get engaged.
